text: Emmanuele Kanyama (25 December 1962 â€“ 17 February 2018) was a Malawian Roman Catholic bishop. Kanyama was ordained to the priesthood in 1990. He served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Dedza, Malawi, from 2007 until his death.Diocese of Dedza Kanyama died of complications from diabetes on 17 February 2018 at the age of 55.Malawi Catholic Bishop Kanyama of Dedza diocese dies == References == Category:1962 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Malawian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Deaths from diabetes
title: Emmanuele Kanyama
